attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year the pension increase does not cover the real cost of living increase of OAPs. A new index should be introduced to correct this serious problem.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already covering this issue, for example: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/pension-increase/

Also, the title of the petition should be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
